description: A LinkUp trap is sent by the ATM interface
while link up is dected. The slot id is reported
because individual virtual port number is not applicable
here.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::atmLinkUp POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmAMASlotNumber i 9999 POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmAMAActualUse i 1 POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmCurrentAMAType i 1

description: The slot number for which the following AMA
information applies.
variables.name: POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmAMASlotNumber

description: The AMA that is actually being used. If the
link to the primary AMA fails, this field
shows that the backup AMA is in use, even
though the primary AMA was selected for
use.
variables.name: POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmAMAActualUse

description: The PHY-layer protocol actually in use.
The protocol can be one of the following:
155M OC3 - 155 Mb/s using an OC-3 connector
45M DS3 - 45 Mb/s using a DS3 connector
39M E3 - 39 Mb/s using an E3 connector.
variables.name: POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmCurrentAMAType

description: A LinkDown trap is sent by the ATM interface
while link down is dected. The slot id is reported
because individual virtual port number is not applicable
here.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::atmLinkDown POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmAMASlotNumber i 9999 POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmPreviousAMA i 1 POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmPreviousAMAType i 1

description: The slot number for which the following AMA
information applies.
variables.name: POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmAMASlotNumber

description: The AMA that is actually being used before
link down or cut over. The initial value
is notset.
variables.name: POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmPreviousAMA

description: The PHY-layer protocol in use before
link down or cut-over.
The protocol can be one of the following:
155M OC3 - 155 Mb/s using an OC-3 connector
45M DS3 - 45 Mb/s using a DS3 connector
39M E3 - 39 Mb/s using an E3 connector.
variables.name: POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmPreviousAMAType

description: A trap is sent if cut over is dected. The cut over
can be from primary to back or vice versa.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::atmCutOver POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmAMASlotNumber i 9999 POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmAMAActualUse i 1 POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmCurrentAMAType i 1 POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmPreviousAMA i 1 POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmPreviousAMAType i 1

description: The slot number for which the following AMA
information applies.
variables.name: POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmAMASlotNumber

description: The AMA that is actually being used. If the
link to the primary AMA fails, this field
shows that the backup AMA is in use, even
though the primary AMA was selected for
use.
variables.name: POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmAMAActualUse

description: The PHY-layer protocol actually in use.
The protocol can be one of the following:
155M OC3 - 155 Mb/s using an OC-3 connector
45M DS3 - 45 Mb/s using a DS3 connector
39M E3 - 39 Mb/s using an E3 connector.
variables.name: POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmCurrentAMAType

description: The AMA that is actually being used before
link down or cut over. The initial value
is notset.
variables.name: POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmPreviousAMA

description: The PHY-layer protocol in use before
link down or cut-over.
The protocol can be one of the following:
155M OC3 - 155 Mb/s using an OC-3 connector
45M DS3 - 45 Mb/s using a DS3 connector
39M E3 - 39 Mb/s using an E3 connector.
variables.name: POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmPreviousAMAType

description: A BootUp trap is sent by the ATM interface
while startup is dected. The slot id is reported
because individual virtual port number is not applicable
here.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::atmBootUp POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmAMASlotNumber i 9999 POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmAMAActualUse i 1 POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmCurrentAMAType i 1

description: The slot number for which the following AMA
information applies.
variables.name: POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmAMASlotNumber

description: The AMA that is actually being used. If the
link to the primary AMA fails, this field
shows that the backup AMA is in use, even
though the primary AMA was selected for
use.
variables.name: POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmAMAActualUse

description: The PHY-layer protocol actually in use.
The protocol can be one of the following:
155M OC3 - 155 Mb/s using an OC-3 connector
45M DS3 - 45 Mb/s using a DS3 connector
39M E3 - 39 Mb/s using an E3 connector.
variables.name: POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmCurrentAMAType

description: A Fault trap is sent by the ATM interface
while a series of link down is dected. The slot id is reported
because individual virtual port number is not applicable
here.

event.Summary: ATM fault because a series of links are down

description: The slot number for which the following AMA
information applies.
variables.name: POWERHUB-ATM-MIB::alAtmAMASlotNumber
